textBox.richText: Ketan Kotwal is joining the team

Ketan Kotwal is joining the Biometrics group at Idiap in March 2018 as a postdoc. Welcome Ketan ! Ketan Kotwal obtained his MTech and PhD from Indian Institute of Technology Bombay (IIT Bombay) in 2012 with specialization in image processing. His PhD work develops new approaches for multi-band image visualization and their evaluation. His work on optimization-based fusion framework was selected in top 10 papers in the International Conference on Information Fusion in 2011. Ketan is the recipient of Best Thesis Award by the Computer Society of India (CSI), as well as Excellence in Thesis Award by IIT Bombay. He is the co-author of research monograph "Hyperspectral Image Fusion" published by Springer, US.  Ketan was a part of multimedia group at Samsung Research India where he developed camera features for Samsung's flagship mobiles. For last 2 years, he has consulted to several companies and startups for R&D problems in image processing, computer vision, and machine learning.
